mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_QUESTION WHERE DIVISION = #{division} and QNO = #{qno}
SELECT * FROM TBL_QUESTION WHERE writer = #{writer} ORDER BY qno DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM TBL_QUESTION WHERE DIVISION = #{division}
SELECT * FROM TBL_QUESTION_RESULT WHERE member_id = #{id} ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_QUESTION (QNO, TITLE, CONTENT1, CONTENT2, CONTENT3, CONTENT4, ANSWER, "COMMENT", WRITER, SUCCESS, REGDATE, "updateDate", FILEPATH, DIVISION) VALUES (#{qno}, #{title}, #{content1}, #{content2}, #{content3}, #{content4}, #{answer}, #{comment}, #{writer}, 0, sysdate, sysdate, null, 'w')
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_QUESTION SET title = #{title}, CONTENT1 = #{content1}, CONTENT2 = #{content2}, CONTENT3 = #{content3}, CONTENT4 = #{content4}, ANSWER = #{answer}, "COMMENT" = #{comment}, "updateDate" = sysdate WHERE qno = #{qno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_QUESTION_RESULT (NO, MEMBER_ID, TESTDATE, ANSWER, COUNT) VALUES (SEQ_QUESTION_RESULT.nextval, #{member_id}, sysdate, #{answer}, #{count})
